overview: Film in three parts:  (1) Paranorama 3 and 4: a handmade Région Centrale. At once observation and description of the realm of vision, of what is possible to see (sound recorded at the time of shooting).  (2) Paranorama 5: simple observation of the realm of vision (sound added at a later time: illustration).  (3) Pierre Rivière and I: attempt at reading the first lines from Pierre Rivière's testimony, as an embodiment rather than a stage direction.
title: Lougarou de Nouillorque
